about_the_game:
Summary

Embark on an epic voyage in search of the mythical artifact Nienix through galaxies in conflict. Be prepared for an action-packed experience! As the Nienix is believed to possess an incredible power, it is sought by every faction in the known universe.

Nienix is a fast-paced multiplayer action role playing game with tight controls. The world is procedurally generated, making it infinite and each game session unique.

Demo Information

You can continue your progress in the full game when it is released. The full Nienix experience includes the following features:
  • a 15+ hour main quest with a captivating story that span over four acts
  • 60 character progression levels
  • carefully designed character progression systems, such as extensive skill trees
  • thousands of different enemies to encounter, legendary loot to obtain and events that are waiting to be discovered
  • lots of end-game content, such as a hard+ mode (available upon completion of main quest), raids, special events, and a hardcore mode
  • 12 challenging and unique boss fights and hundreds of minor bosses
  • enemy factions that compete for dominance in the universe
  • designed from ground up for multiplayer online COOP and PvP
  • procedural content, making each character build and playthrough unique
  • an infinite, immersive universe

The demo is limited in the following aspects:
  • it only includes content from the first act up to the first boss (~45+ minutes)
  • the only online mode available is COOP campaign

You can continue your progress in the full game when it is released. The full Nienix experience includes the following features:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GFX, OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: Quad Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GFX, OpenGL 2.0+ support

short_description: Search for the legendary lost artifact Nienix through galaxies in conflict! A demo of an open world sci-fi online multiplayer action RPG.
